thread.section_title: Point A Hotel, London Canary Wharf - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Simple, Central, Convenient
thread.title_full: Simple, Central, Convenient - Review of Point A Hotel, London Canary Wharf, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: hugh_baker
title: Simple, Central, Convenient
text: Best value hotel in Canary Wharf, clean rooms, friendly staff -- does exactly what I need. I stay here every week now, and it has become a home away from home. My work has an agent that can only offer a hotel for 3x the price, 5 or more stops away on the Jubilee line or DLR.
